metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39947 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In specific circumstances, trace file buffers in GitLab Runner versions up to 14.3.4, 14.4 to 14.4.2, and 14.5 to 14.5.2 would re-use the file descriptor 0 for multiple traces and mix the output of several jobs

criterions.comment: gitlab-ci-multi-runner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
